content: Documenting and reporting on compliance status As AI is set to impact more and more business processes, AI governance becomes more than just a legal check box. Organizations will need to define/update their risk frameworks and enterprise policies; especially as generative AI and agentic AI bring amplified and new risks to an organization. Operational risk management Operational risk management is also a well-established discipline, which can now also be applied to AI.
